plays.text: Goal scored by Mike Rathje assisted by Owen Nolan and Scott Hannan

Penalty to Patrick Marleau 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Jeff Hackett
Goal scored by Patrick Marleau unassisted
Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for Hooking Patrick Traverse
Goal scored by Doug Gilmour assisted by Yanic Perreault and Donald Audette
Goal scored by Teemu Selanne assisted by Patrick Marleau
